akn:section.akn:heading: Additional considerations for renewal of licenses.

akn:content.akn:p: If proper notice has been given, as provided in subchapter II of Chapter 4, and no objection to the appropriateness of the establishment is filed, the establishment shall be presumed to be appropriate for the locality, section, or portion of the District where it is located.

If an application for license renewal is made the subject of contested proceedings and the license expires before the Boardâ€™s decision on the renewal application, the Board may extend the expiration date during the pendency of the decision on the renewal application.
